Talk_0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Joy_05>And we're going to use them to restore an
unstoppable weapon for <clr:0000>the man himself<clr:ffff>...
the Magnificent One!
Talk_0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughBad_01>Once we do, we'll grant his wish for
the <clr:0000>end of the world<clr:ffff>!
Talk_0016: So, we don't need the power you stole...
Talk_0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Regrettable_02>Urk!<sp:5:0:0> Bleh! This place has too much sand!<sp:5:1:0>
You're only winning because it keeps
getting in my eyes!
Talk_0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Talk_04>I thought that power might make things
easier, but it's just icing. I'm after cake.
Talk_0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:LaughS_00>We've already stripped all the resources
here. If you want this empty shell, you can
have it!
Talk_0018: So I'm going to let you off easy again.
Talk_0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Groundwork_01>That hunk-of-junk construct wasn't
responding anyway... Change of plans!
Talk_0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0901>"Operation Steal the Ancient Power"
is over! I quit!
Talk_0020:
I'm going to be swimming in crystals at
the <clr:0000>Eastern Abandoned Mine<clr:ffff>!
Talk_0019:
Our collection of <clr:0000>crystallized charges<clr:ffff> is
well underway, and the restoration of
the <clr:0000>final weapon<clr:ffff> is close at hand!
Talk_0013:
We've been collecting a mighty power
source scattered all across this landâ€”
<clr:0000>crystallized charges<clr:ffff>!
